data.text: Mommra mma yɛnto dwom wɔ anigyeɛ so mma Awurade;
Ɛfiri sɛ, Awurade yɛ Onyankopɔn kɛseɛ,
Ne nsam na asase mu nneɛma nyinaa wɔ,
Ɛpo wɔ no. Ɔno na ɔbɔeɛ,
mommpirim mo akoma sɛdeɛ moyɛɛ wɔ Meriba no,
Ɛhɔ no, mo mpanimfoɔ sɔɔ me hwɛeɛ,
Me bo fuu saa nnipa no mfeɛ aduanan
Ɛno enti mekaa ntam wɔ mʼabufuo mu sɛ,
